targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time_column,
  value1
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)
SELECT sum(Confirmed) as Casos_Confirmados, sum(Deaths) as Muertes FROM `covid-336715.datoscovid.datos` where Date(Fecha) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 Day)

SELECT Country_Region, sum(Confirmed) as Casos_Confirmados, sum(Deaths) as Muertes FROM `covid-336715.datoscovid.datos` where Date(Fecha) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 Day) and Country_Region = '$pais' GROUP BY Country_Region

SELECT date(d1.Fecha) as time, (sum(d1.Confirmed)-sum(d2.Confirmed)) as Confirmados
FROM `covid-336715.datoscovid.datos` d1, `covid-336715.datoscovid.datos` d2 
WHERE Date(d2.Fecha) = DATE_SUB(Date(d1.Fecha), INTERVAL 1 Day)
and d1.Country_Region = d2.Country_Region 
and d1.Province_State = d2.Province_State
and d1.Country_Region='Spain'
GROUP BY time order by time,Confirmados

panels.title: Casos Totales por día en España

targets.rawSql:
SELECT d.Province_State, d.Country_Region, i.Lat, i.Long_, d.Incident_Rate,d.Confirmed, d.Deaths
FROM `covid-336715.datoscovid.datos` d, `covid-336715.datoscovid.info` i 
WHERE d.Province_State = i.Province_State and d.Country_Region = i.Country_Region and Date(d.Fecha) = DATE_SUB(CURRENT_DATE(), INTERVAL 1 Day)

SELECT date(d1.Fecha) as time, (sum(d1.Confirmed)-sum(d2.Confirmed)) as Confirmados
FROM `covid-336715.datoscovid.datos` d1, `covid-336715.datoscovid.datos` d2 
WHERE Date(d2.Fecha) = DATE_SUB(Date(d1.Fecha), INTERVAL 1 Day)
and d1.Country_Region = d2.Country_Region 
and d1.Province_State = d2.Province_State
and d1.Province_State='Pais Vasco'
GROUP BY time order by time,Confirmados

panels.title: Casos Totales por día en el Pais Vasco

targets.rawSql:
select Confirmed, Date(Fecha) as Fecha 
from `covid-336715.datoscovid.datos` 
where Province_State='$comunidades' 
and DATE(Fecha)< current_date() 
and DATE(Fecha) > DATE_SUB(current_date(), INTERVAL $dias+1 DAY) ORDER BY Fecha

panels.title: Casos covid en las Comunidades Españolas

FROM `covid-336715.datoscovid.datos`
WHERE Province_State= 'Andalusia' and Last_Update='$lastupdate'

FROM `covid-336715.datoscovid.datos`

list.definition:
SELECT   sum(`Confirmed`) as total
FROM `covid-336715.datoscovid.datos`
WHERE
  Country_Region = '$pais'
